title: Client Lower priorty players cannot join games at all.
body: Screen shot attached I have been in que for over a half an hour at this point but the timer just keeps resetting.

replies.body: Hmmmm yea that's not supposed to happen. It looks like you've still got more than just one game left in that LPQ, so those games may still need to be played through, but go ahead and shoot this screenshot over to our player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to have them fix this if they can!
